definition[0]: the study or industry of making equipment, such as computers and televisions, that work electronically
explanation[0]: In this meaning, electronics is followed by a singular verb
example[1]: Electronics deals with electrical circuits that have active components
definition[2]: the study of making equipment that works using electricity and computer CHIPs
example[3]: She studied electronics at Manchester University.
definition[3]: equipment that works using electricity and computer CHIPs, and the industry of making it
example[4]: a company that makes electronics and computer parts
example[5]: Electronics is a strategic area in which government aid is justified.
